messages.msgSnippet: We watched it here. It was so great! The kids have grown up so much since the first movie. We also loved hearing the story from JK s point of view. Kristi (Who
messages.messageBody:
We watched it here. It was so great! The kids have grown up so much
since the first movie. We also loved hearing the story from JK's
point of view.

Kristi (Who is new here, and has just been reading messages. Intro
soon :)

messages.subject: Harry Potter stuff on A & E right now.
messages.msgSnippet: I thought some of you might want to know that Harry Potter stuff is on A & E right now, until I think 10:00.  Until 9 is a biography of J.K. Rowling and until
messages.messageBody:
I thought some of you might want to know that Harry Potter stuff is
on A & E right now, until I think 10:00. Until 9 is a biography of
J.K. Rowling and until 10 is about the making of the next movie.

Sheila
